name: Retrieve a specific book by ID
description:
As an admin
  I want to retrieve books using the API
  So that I can view details of all books or a specific book
descriptionHtml:
As an admin
I want to retrieve books using the API
So that I can view details of all books or a specific book

testStage.description:
As an admin
  I want to retrieve books using the API
  So that I can view details of all books or a specific book

steps.name: I am authorized with "Basic YWRtaW46cGFzc3dvcmQ=" as an admin
I have created a book with title "To Kill A Mocking Bird" and author "Harper Lee"
I have created a book with title "Winged Dreams" and author "Saarah"
When I send a GET request to "/api/books/2"
Then The response status code should be 200
And The response body should contain
